title: UserInputType
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: UserInputType
type: enum
summary: |
  Describes the type of a user input event.
description: |
  The UserInputType enum describes the kind of input being performed (mouse,
  keyboard, gamepad, touch, etc). This enum is used by the
  Class.InputObject.UserInputType property of the same name, as well as
  various Class.UserInputService and Class.GuiObject events.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: MouseButton1
    summary: |
      The left mouse button.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: MouseButton2
    summary: |
      The right mouse button.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: MouseButton3
    summary: |
      The middle mouse button.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: MouseWheel
    summary: |
      The mouse wheel.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: MouseMovement
    summary: |
      Movement of the mouse. Fires changed events each time the player's cursor
      position changes and when the move enters/leaves the game window.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Touch
    summary: |
      A tap on the screen from a mobile device.
    value: 7
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Keyboard
    summary: |
      Key press on a keyboard.
    value: 8
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Focus
    summary: |
      The client regaining focus of the Roblox window.
    value: 9
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Accelerometer
    summary: |
      The accelerometer of a mobile device.
    value: 10
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gyro
    summary: |
      The Gyroscope of a mobile device.
    value: 11
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad1
    summary: |
      Input from the 1st plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 12
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad2
    summary: |
      Input from the 2nd plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 13
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad3
    summary: |
      Input from the 3rd plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 14
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad4
    summary: |
      Input from the 4th plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 15
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad5
    summary: |
      Input from the 5th plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 16
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad6
    summary: |
      Input from the 6th plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 17
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad7
    summary: |
      Input from the 7th plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 18
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Gamepad8
    summary: |
      Input from the 8th plugged in Gamepad.
    value: 19
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: TextInput
    summary: |
      Input of Text into a text-based Class.GuiObject. Normally this is only a
      Class.TextBox.
    value: 20
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: InputMethod
    summary: |
      Text input from an input method editor (IME).
      Class.InputObject|InputObjects with this type aren't currently fired.
    value: 21
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: None
    summary: |
      Unknown UserInputType.
    value: 22
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
